TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContentType extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 MIME 协议 Content-Type 标头。

span.span: Represents a MIME protocol Content-Type header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中的信息用于描述电子邮件中包含的数据，使显示电子邮件的软件能够以适当的方式呈现内容。The information in the class is used to describe the data contained in an email message in such a way that software that displays email can present the content in an appropriate manner. 与 类结合使用，以指定附件中的内容类型。 is used with the class to specify the type of content in the attachment. RFC 2045 第5.1 节中介绍了 Content-type 标头的语法。The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 提供了有关 MIME 媒体类型及其参数的详细信息。RFC 2046 provides detailed information about MIME media types and their parameters. [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/)提供了这些 rfc。These RFCs are available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用附件发送电子邮件，并显示附件的 属性。The following code example sends an email message with an attachment and displays the properties for the attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Boundary { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Boundary : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由此实例表示的 Content-Type 标头中包含的边界参数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the boundary parameter included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
A that contains the value associated with the boundary parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Content-type 标头的以下示例中， 参数的值为 "`-----boundary---0`"。In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the parameter is "`-----boundary---0`". `content-type: multipart/mixed; boundary=-----boundary---0` 将此属性设置为 `null` 或 以从标题中删除边界信息。Set this property to `null` or to remove the boundary information from the header. RFC 2045 第5.1 节中介绍了 Content-type 标头的语法。The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 第5.1.1 部分包含了对边界参数的深入讨论。An in-depth discussion of the boundary parameter is contained in RFC 2046 Section 5.1.1. [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/)提供了这些 rfc。These RFCs are available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 属性的值。The following code example displays the value of the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#5)]

member this.CharSet : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由此实例表示的 Content-Type 标头中包含的字符集参数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the charset parameter included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.

value.span: ，包含与字符集参数关联的值。

span.span: A that contains the value associated with the charset parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Content-type 标头的以下示例中， 属性的值为 "`us-ascii`"。In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the property is "`us-ascii`". `content-type: application/x-myType; charset=us-ascii` 将此属性设置为 `null` 或 删除标头中的字符集信息。Set this property to `null` or to remove the charset information from the header. RFC 2045 第5.1 节中介绍了详细说明 Content-type 标头语法的语法。A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 第4.1.2 节包含了字符集参数的深入讨论。An in-depth discussion of the charset parameter is contained in RFC 2046 Section 4.1.2. [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/)提供了这些 rfc。These RFCs are available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示属性的值。The following code example displays the value of the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MediaType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MediaType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由此实例表示的 Content-Type 标头中包含的媒体类型值。

span.span: Gets or sets the media type value included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.

value.span: 包含媒体类型和子类型值的 。

span.span: A that contains the media type and subtype value.

value.span: 在该值中，子类型后面没有分号 (;) 分隔符。

span.span: This value does not include the semicolon (;) separator that follows the subtype.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在以下 Content-type 标头示例中，将 `"application/x-myType"` 属性的值。In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the property is `"application/x-myType"`. `content-type: application/x-myType; name=data.xyz` 将此属性设置为 `null` 或 删除标头中的名称信息。Set this property to `null` or to remove the name information from the header. RFC 2045 第5.1 节中介绍了 Content-type 标头的语法。The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 提供了有关 MIME 媒体类型的详细信息。RFC 2046 provides detailed information on MIME media types. [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/)提供了这些 rfc。These RFCs are available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性的值。The following code example sets the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由此实例表示的 Content-Type 标头中包含的名称参数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the name parameter included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
A that contains the value associated with the name parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在以下 Content-type 标头示例中，将 `"data.xyz"` 属性的值。In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the property is `"data.xyz"`. `content-type: application/x-myType; name=data.xyz` RFC 2045 第5.1 节中提供了详细说明 Content-type 标头语法的语法，在[https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/)提供。A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1, available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). 将 的内容指定为 或 时，可以使用 来设置在接收方系统上存储内容的文件的名称。When specifying content for a as a or , you can use to set the name of the file that stores the content on the recipient's system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性的值，以指定作为流附加的文件的名称。The following code example sets the value of the property to specify a name for a file being attached as a stream. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As StringDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含由此实例表示的 Content-Type 标头中包含的参数的字典。

span.span: Gets the dictionary that contains the parameters included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
A writable that contains name and value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造 对象时，可以通过指定整个 Content-type 值来设置参数，也可以将参数添加到 属性返回的 中。You can set the parameters by specifying the entire Content-Header value when constructing a object or you can add parameters to the returned by the property. 向字典添加参数项时，参数的名称为项的键，参数的值为该项的值。When adding a parameter entry to the dictionary, the name of the parameter is the entry's key and the value of the parameter is the entry's value. RFC 2045 第5.1 节中介绍了详细说明 Content-type 标头语法的语法。A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 提供了有关 MIME 媒体类型及其关联参数的详细信息。RFC 2046 provides detailed information on MIME media types and their associated parameters. [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/)提供了这些 rfc。These RFCs are available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性返回的字典中的值。The following code example displays the values in the dictionary returned by this property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#5)]

summary.span: 返回此 对象的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Returns a string representation of this object.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含此 的当前设置。

span.span: A that contains the current settings for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的值包含用于创建此 的字符串（如果已指定），并且未更改任何属性值。The value of the method contains the string used to create this , if one was specified and no property values have been changed. 如果未指定字符串，或者在创建此 后，一个或多个属性值已更改，则 的值是使用当前属性值撰写的 Content-type 标头格式的字符串。If no string was specified, or one or more property values have changed since this was created, the value of is a string in the format of a Content-Type header that is composed using the current property values. 该字符串不包含 `"Content-type:"` 前缀。The string does not include the `"Content-type:"` prefix. 内容类型标头的语法在 RFC 2045 第5.1 节中进行了介绍， [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/)提供。The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1, available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 的字符串表示形式。The following code example displays the string representation of a .
